attributes.action: Change the formula/ criteria used for child maintenance payments
attributes.additional_details:
Review the CMS formulas urgently
Make it transparent and fair
Ensure children do not become victims as they do currently
Ensure hard working people are not made bankrupt 
Ensure abusers are stopped from abusing further through this system 
There is something in the criteria about private school fees but nothing for  Under 5 childcare costs or any wrap around care necessary for a full time teacher and their children in state school
attributes.background:
Currently a person can “claim” they live with 3 or more non biological children and reduce their Child maintenance  immediately  
The paying parent does not have to pay for any childcare costs which should be shared when both parents work full time.
.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing rules for calculating child maintenance, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
